body.section:
AEM (a.k.a. Adobe CQ) 5.6 or 6
maven3
Minor modifications to version numbers in the POM should make most if-not-all features available in CQ 5.5. However, let's try to keep moving forward. 5.6 and 6 are out and ready to party.

As mentioned in the README, there are AEM6 and AEM5 specific maven profiles which correct some dependency and bundle exports. Some libraries not found in AEM 5 are provided out-of-box in AEM 6. mvn clean install -P local-author,aem5 The above should be used for a localhost author instance of CQ 5.6 running on 4502. AEM 6 is the default active profile assumption.

ol.li: Desire to see out-of-box APIs used appropriately
i18n Helpers. Sane patterns for content-managed i18n copy with reasonable Sling supported fallbacks as well as low-effort access to the CQ out-of-box i18n translation helper.
WCM Helpers. Removal of scriptlet boilerplate for driving component display behavior based on WCMMode. Additional utility methods found in WCMUtil.
XSS Helpers. taglib functions for XSSAPI such as encoding for XML and filtering markup based on anti-samy policy files.
Simple Cache. Basic application caching powered by Google Guava which can be managed by OSGi configurations or created ad-hoc.
Extended Page Filters. Composable, flexible, and configurable alternatives to PageFilter which is commonly used to create navigation and sitemap components.
Components & Misc.. Simple components highlighting some of the above patterns and how a developer might use them.
